ResourceHeader.Description: Richardson (RICH) Magnetometer Station is located in Richardson, Texas, USA.  It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the Richardson fluxgate magnetometer is managed by Dr. Marc Hairston at University of Texas Dallas.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC Richardson Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC Richardson Ground Magnetometer Station
